org.lwjgl.opencl

Class CLImageFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.opencl.CLImageFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class CLImageFormat
extends Struct
    The image format descriptor struct.

    cl_image_format members

    MemberTypeDescription
    image_channel_ordercl_channel_orderspecifies the number of channels and the channel layout i.e. the memory layout in which channels are stored in the image
    image_channel_data_typecl_channel_typedescribes the size of the channel data type. The number of bits per element determined by the image_channel_data_type and image_channel_order must be a power of two.

      • CLImageFormat

      • CLImageFormat

        public CLImageFormat(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a CLImageFormat instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
